name: It's Just a Phase (Jaco van Hemert, Macajust, cannice)
name_original: It's Just a Phase (Jaco van Hemert, Macajust, cannice)
description:
The earth has been knocked off its axis, causing the moon to transition through its lunar phases rapidly. As if that's not bad enough, you're a werewolf, unleashed with each passing full moon. It's Just a Phase begins with you being run out of town by an angry mob. Escape the werewolf-intolerant villagers as quickly as you can in this challenging platformer. But be-were! You'll transform back and forth into your (nearly) uncontrollable werewolf form every 10 seconds. Try to complete the level as fast as you can! Do it without killing any villagers to get the best (low) score. 

Credits: 

Jaco van Hemert
Game concept, programming, level design

Cannice
Game concept and art

Michael "Macajust" Utley
Game concept and programming

Adam Wilson
Music and sound effects 
(Find Adam on Spotify here!)
